Web Service Endpoint# POST /v1/appEventScreenshots

App Store Connect API 1.7+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/POST-v1-appEventScreenshots#url)



```
POST https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/appEventScreenshots
```

## [HTTP Body](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/POST-v1-appEventScreenshots#http-body)

`[AppEventScreenshotCreateRequest`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/appeventscreenshotcreaterequest)

 Content-Type: application/json ## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/POST-v1-appEventScreenshots#response-codes)

` 201 Created``[AppEventScreenshotResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/appeventscreenshotresponse)`Created`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`
